item.title: How to Become a Load Tester
item.description: Originally posted here. Load testing can be a pretty intimidating field to get into, but it’s easy to get started. Here are some concrete steps you can take to start learning how to load test from scratch. In this video, Flood co-founder Tim Koopmans and I teamed up at Tricentis User Conference 2020 to talk about the essential ingredients for load testing. Background required for load testing Load testing can be quite technical.
